name: Rounded Awesome Bar Highlight for Firefox 3
description:
Gives you Rounded Edges on the Awesome Bar.

This makes your AwesomeBar's currently selected row have a rounded border
This style supports only Firefox3, giving it even more of a WOW effect!.

Applies to:
+ Currently Selected Row / Item on the Awesome-Bar



Additional Information:
+ Uses new CSS3 Circular Radius code!
+ This style has been tested on Multiple Themes! Including NASA Night Launch, NASA Normal, and the Default Firefox 3 Theme.  It has rounded perfectly on each.

Browser Versions:
+ Works only on Firefox3

Integrates with the following Styles:
+ Style 8555
+ Style 8558
+ Style 8414
+ Style 8410

Works well with:
+ All of the Well Rounded styles
+ The Styles Displayed above

Changelog:
- Initial Release
